Header: Prime Minister claims the present Government has unleashed a revolution in education
Content: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe has said that the present Government has unleashed a revolution in education. The Prime Minister expressed this view joining in several openings in the Ruwanwella area. Many development projects were vested in the public under the patronage of Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinvhe while work on more projects was launched. Some of this work was carried out this morning. Accordingly work on the Kahanthota Visal Drinking Water Scheme in Ruwanwella was launched under the patronage of Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe. This would supply drinking water for a large group. This would find solutions to the drinking issue encountered by the people of the area for a long time. Meanwhile the Prime Minister also opened the new building of the Sulaimania Muslim Maha Vidyalaya at Kahanthota in Ruwanwella. This building has been opened under the Project the Nearest School is the Best School. It is a two storied building. The Ruwanwella Bus Stand and the road surrounding the playground are being carpeted and developed. Work on this Project was also launched under the patronage of Prime Minister Ranil Wickremasinghe. A large gathering including Ministers and Parliamentarians joined in the occasion.
